level 0.name: Clumsy Dodge
level 0.description: Move one square in any direction, and test AGL with DC {DC}. On a failure, gain the 'prone' card. On success, you may set your facing to any direction. Double the DC of the above check to move two squares in a straight line

level 0.name: Step
level 0.description:
Move one square in any direction.

Return this card to your hand

level 0.name: Unarmed Strike
level 0.description:
You may return this card to your pool and replace with the any 'basic attack' card.

Target: One square within reach 1 or your own square

Choose {NumEffects} of:
  • Deal ({DMG}) damage.
  • Enemy must make a DC ({DC}) STR or AGL check. On failure, they move one square away from or towards you, your choice. Remember that, if a character moves into another character's square for any reason, if either character desires, both characters gain opposed 'grappling' cards
  • Same check as above, but on failure, they gain the 'prone' effect

level 0.name: Dagger Strike
level 0.description:
Choose one of:
  • Deal ({ADV} adv: {DMG}) damage, targeting one square within reach 1 or your own square.
  • Deal ({Range ADV} adv: {Range DMG}) damage, targeting a line within reach STR * 4. Your dagger ends up at the end of the line or in the square of whatever you hit.

level 0.name: Longsword Strike
level 0.description:
Choose one of:
  • Deal {DMG} damage, targeting a line of three squares.
  • Deal {DMG} damage, targeting a cone of two squares.

level 0.name: Shield Block
level 0.description: Chose a 'strike' attack targeting your square or an adjacent square. Your shield takes damage from the attack. If it is destroyed, any leftover damage continues toward the original target

level 1.name: Focus
level 1.description: Add +1 priority to another of your cards activated this tick

level 1.name: Reckless Action
level 1.description: Add +1d4-2 priority to another of your cards activated this tick

level 1.name: Precise Strike
level 1.description: Bid TEC vs the armor's Coverage. Every time your opponent uses a 'movement' card, your bid is removed. When you activate a 'strike' 'precise' card, their armor's bypass value counts as their armor's bid. You do not need to flip this card until you activate it

level 1.name: Parry
level 1.description: Chose a 'strike' attack targeting your square or an adjacent square. Move one square toward the source of the attack. For the purposes of calculating the damage of that attack, subtract a total of {DMG} from whichever attributes of the attacker you see fit. Your attacker looses all their combo and cannot refresh this tick.

level 1.name: Weapon Block
level 1.description: Chose a 'strike' attack targeting your square or an adjacent square. Your weapon takes damage from the attack. If your weapon is destroyed, any leftover damage continues toward the original target

level 1.name: QuickStep/Dodge
level 1.description:
Chose one of:
  • Move one square in any direction. Next action in this stack gains +1 priority.
  • Move two squares in a straight line, and test AGL with DC {DC}. On a failure, gain the 'prone' card.{Extras}.
  • Lose 2 priority on this card. Select any one non-area attack that is currently targeting your square. You are unaffected by it.

level 2.name: Judo Toss
level 2.description:
Target: One creature that has, this tick, moved to your square or a square you are currently adjacent to.

Continue their movement one extra square (or two if the one would mean they end up in your square). They immedately lose all AP they currently have in play, and all cards they currently have on the field are discarded. They gain the 'prone' status
level 2.cost: 22 - EMP, min 12, half the time sunk into learning Parry counts for this as well

cards.name: Drag
cards.description: Move one square in any direction.

cards.name: Chomp
cards.description:
Target: One forward square

Deal 1d4 + STR - 1 damage. If you deal damage, you can latch on to your target. Gain the 'latched on' effect, while your target gains the 'chomped' effect

cards.name: Rip
cards.description:
Target: One entity which you latched on to and have at least 10 tokens on

Deal STRd4 damage. Heal half the damage you dealt. If that would put you over maximum, gain 1/10th of the additional as permanent extra HP. Do not round -- extra bits add up over uses of this card

cards.name: Prone
cards.description:
You may not use 'movement' cards that do not also have the 'prone' tag.
Can be removed by spending 2 AP

cards.name: Grappled
cards.description: As long as this card is in effect, cannot use any 'movement' cards. This card may be turned into 'Grappling' if you have at least one bid token on it

cards.name: Grapping
cards.description:
As long as this card is in effect, any 'movement' cards you use have 0 combo, 1/2 priority, and affect both you and the person you are grappling. If you have at least one bid token on this card, you may chose to only affect yourself with movement cards. If you leave the square of the person you are grappling, discard this card.

You may turn this card's partner from 'Grappling' into 'Grappled' if you have at least your enemy's STR bid tokens on this card.

You may turn this card's partner from 'Grappled' into 'Pinned' if you have at least 2x your enemy's STR bid tokens on this card

cards.name: Pinned
cards.description: As long as this card is in effect, cannot use any 'movement' or 'strike' cards. Your STR and TEC count as one lower for the purposes of bidding on this card. This card may be turned into 'Grappling' if you have at least one bid token on it

cards.name: Latching On
cards.description: As long as this card is in effect, you may not use any 'movement' or 'strike' cards. You may voluntarily discard this card by paying 1 AP with priority TEC + 4. This card is discarded if its paired 'Chomped' card is discarded

cards.name: Chomped
cards.description: As long as this card is in effect, all 'movement' cards take + 1 AP, and apply to both you and the creature that has chomped you. All 'strike' cards have -1 priority. Each time you activate a 'movement' or 'strike' card, take 1d4-1 damage. Can be removed if you have at least one bid token on this card

cards.name: Targeted By Channel
cards.description: This is the pair of a 'Channel <emote>' card. Bid DISC vs chaneller's MAG to remove it.

cards.name: Motorcycle Gear
cards.description:
Bypass: 10

Gain DR 2. Reduce your AGL by 3 - STR.

cards.name: Riot Gear
cards.description:
Bypass: 10

Gain DR 4. Reduce your AGL by 5 - STR.

cards.name: Full Plate
cards.description:
Bypass: 10

Gain DR 8. Reduce your AGL by 7 - STR.

cards.name: Bulletproof Vest
cards.description:
Bypass: 4

Gain DR 8. Reduce your AGL by 2-STR.

cards.name: 1 {Emote}
cards.description:
Any number of 'N Emote' cards can be discarded from your hand to pull one 'Emote' card from your pool with a Cost to pull less than or equal to the sum of the discarded cards

Can be played on top of a currently active Emote card to pay its upkeep at any time

cards.name: 2 {Emote}
cards.description:
Any number of 'N Emote' cards can be discarded from your hand to pull one 'Emote' card from your pool with a Cost to pull less than or equal to the sum of the discarded cards

Can be played on top of a currently active Emote card to pay its upkeep at any time

cards.name: 5 {Emote}
cards.description:
Any number of 'N Emote' cards can be discarded from your hand to pull one 'Emote' card from your pool with a Cost to pull less than or equal to the sum of the discarded cards

Can be played on top of a currently active Emote card to pay its upkeep at any time

level 0.name: Channel Joy
level 0.description:
Cost to activate: 5 Emote

Target: Anyone within line of sight.

Upkeep: 3 Emote/tick

Lock up to 20 Joy from your target's pool and give them a 'Targeted By Channel' card. If you lock 20 points, increase all of your target's stats by 1. Locked joy cannot be drawn, and cannot be used in any other ability. Your target may remove this card by bidding DISC vs your MAG.

level 1.name: Manifest Joy (Playfulness)
level 1.description:
Cost to activate: N Joy

Create an iridescent blob of squishy material approximately the size of a baseball. The joy blob starts with a length stat (LEN) of N. At no time can it be using more LEN than it has avaliable. It targets the nearest MAG creatures within LEN. Each tick, it extends a tendril one square per 6 MAG toward each target at priority MAG * 2. If it enters the same square as a creature, it will poke the creature. If ignored or otherwise shooed away, it will retreat back toward the central body before growing toward a different target. If engaged (its poke is returned, for instance), it will attempt to wrap up its target, using one LEN per six MAG per tick until either its target is fully wrapped up, or it is stopped with a gentle nudge. Anything so encased (which can be just a single injury) rejuvinates slowly, healing 1 point each wound encased every 2d10 minutes so encased. This process uses up 10 Joy per point healed (reducing LEN by the same number), as the solid joy prods, pokes, and eventually incorporates itself into, the injury. This healing process takes energy, costing the healee 2 fatigue per point healed.
This card can be recalled like any other manifestation.

level 1.name: Sunny Disposition
level 1.description: Whenever you would gain Joy, gain +1 Joy

level 1.name: The Party Don't Stop
level 1.description:
Cost to activate: 5 Joy

. Target: Anyone willing within arm's reach.

Lock 10 Joy. Targt gains 1d4 + MAG/2 to their fatigue limit

level 1.name: Channel Joy+
level 1.description:
Cost to activate: 7 Joy

Target: Anyone within line of sight.

Lock up to 28 Joy from your target's pool and give them a 'Targeted By Channel' card. For every fourteen points locked, increase your al of your target's stats by 1. Locked joy cannot be drawn, and cannot be used in any other ability. Your target may remove this card by bidding DISC vs your MAG.

level 1.name: Multi-Channel Joy
level 1.description:
Cost to activate: 10 Emote

Target: Anyone within line of sight, up to MAG targets.

Upkeep: 6 Emote/tick

Lock up to 20 Joy from each of your target's pools and give them a 'Targeted By Channel' card. If your lock 20 points of joy, increase all of your target's stats by 1. Locked Joy cannot be drawn, and cannot be used in any other ability. Your target may remove this card from them by bidding DISC vs your MAG (compare your bid value to the values on each of their cards and remove individually).

level 2.name: Sunny Disposition+
level 2.description: Whenever you would gain Joy, gain +1 Joy. Stacks with Sunny Disposition

level 2.name: Multi-Channel Joy+
level 2.description:
Cost to activate: 15 Emote

Target: Anyone within line of sight, up to MAG targets.

Upkeep: 9 Emote/tick

Lock up to 28 Joy from each of your target's pools and give them a 'Targeted By Channel' card. For every fourteen points locked,, increase all of your target's stats by 1. Locked Joy cannot be drawn, and cannot be used in any other ability. Your target may remove this card from them by bidding DISC vs your MAG (compare your bid value to the values on each of their cards and remove individually).

level 3.name: Manifest Joy (Ecstacy)
level 3.description:
Cost to activate: N Joy

Create an iridescent blob of squishy material approximately the size of a baseball. This is highly, highly compressed Joy. The joy blob starts with a length stat (LEN) of N/5. At no time can it be using more LEN than it has avaliable. It targets the nearest MAG creatures within LEN. Each tick, it extends a tendril one square per MAG toward each target at priority MAG * 4. If it enters the same square as a creature, it will immediately wrap around the creature, using one LEN per MAG per tick until its target is encased, and dealing 1d4 damage per LEN spent -- unlike its cousin, Ecstacy is not gentle. It wraps and crushes and burrows into whatever it catches. Once a creature is fully encased (if it's alive), it heals 1 point for each wound encased for every tick so encased. This process uses up 15 joy per point healed (reducing LEN by the same number). Unlike Playfulness, Ecstacy is unhindered by energy limits and healing does not give fatigue.
This card can be recalled like any other manifestation.

level 0.name: Channel Joy
level 0.description:
Cost to activate: 5 Emote

Target: Anyone within line of sight.

Upkeep: 3 Emote/tick

Lock up to 20 Joy from your target's pool and give them a 'Targeted By Channel' card. If you lock 20 points, increase all of your target's stats by 1. Locked joy cannot be drawn, and cannot be used in any other ability. Your target may remove this card by bidding DISC vs your MAG.

level 1.name: Channel Joy+
level 1.description:
Cost to activate: 7 Emote

Target: Anyone within line of sight.

Upkeep: 5 Emote/tick

Lock up to 28 Joy from your target's pool and give them a 'Targeted By Channel' card. For every fourteen points locked, increase your al of your target's stats by 1. Locked joy cannot be drawn, and cannot be used in any other ability. Your target may remove this card by bidding DISC vs your MAG.

level 1.name: Festering Rage
level 1.description: Whenever you would gain Anger, gain +1 Anger

level 1.name: Multi-Channel Joy
level 1.description:
Cost to activate: 10 Emote

Target: Anyone within line of sight, up to MAG targets.

Upkeep: 6 Emote/tick

Lock up to 20 Joy from each of your target's pools and give them a 'Targeted By Channel' card. If your lock 20 points of joy, increase all of your target's stats by 1. Locked Joy cannot be drawn, and cannot be used in any other ability. Your target may remove this card from them by bidding DISC vs your MAG (compare your bid value to the values on each of their cards and remove individually).

level 2.name: Festering Rage+
level 2.description: Whenever you would gain Anger, gain +1 Anger. Stacks with Festering Rage

level 3.name: Multi-Channel Joy+
level 3.description:
Cost to activate: 15 Emote

Target: Anyone within line of sight, up to MAG targets.

Upkeep: 9 Emote/tick

Lock up to 28 Joy from each of your target's pools and give them a 'Targeted By Channel' card. For every fourteen points locked,, increase all of your target's stats by 1. Locked Joy cannot be drawn, and cannot be used in any other ability. Your target may remove this card from them by bidding DISC vs your MAG (compare your bid value to the values on each of their cards and remove individually).

level 0.name: Channel Anger
level 0.description:
Cost to activate: 5 Emote

Target: Anyone within line of sight.

Upkeep: 3 Emote/tick

Lock up to 20 Anger from your target's pool and give them a 'Targeted By Channel' card. For every ten points locked, increase your target's STR, or decrease their AGL or EMP, by 1. Locked anger cannot be drawn, and cannot be used in any other ability. Your target may remove this card by bidding DISC vs your MAG.

level 1.name: Manifest Anger (Barb)
level 1.description:
Cost to activate: 8 + N*5 Anger

Create a cylindrical crystal the length and approximate shape of a tent spike. You may treat it as a dagger dealing 2d8 instead of 1d8 damage. For each additional 10 emote spent on this card, increase damage by 1d8

As long as you maintain contact with the dagger (i.i. don't throw it), leave this card face up (although not necessarily in one of your active slots). Once it leaves your hand, discard this card. Anyone touching/holding/wielding the dagger takes 1d2 - 1 damage during the AP phase of each round. You may spend 1 AP to move the emote spent, along with this card, to your pool.

If you hit someone with this 'dagger', you may discard this card to give them 1/2 of the Anger originally put into this card

level 1.name: Channel Anger+
level 1.description:
Cost to activate: 7 Emote

Target: Anyone within line of sight.

Upkeep: 5 Emote/tick

Lock up to 28 Anger from your target's pool and give them a 'Targeted By Channel' card. For every seven points locked, increase your target's STR, or decrease their AGL or EMP, by 1. Locked anger cannot be drawn, and cannot be used in any other ability. Your target may remove this card by bidding DISC vs your MAG.

level 1.name: Festering Rage
level 1.description: Whenever you would gain Anger, gain +1 Anger

level 1.name: Multi-Channel Anger
level 1.description:
Cost to activate: 10 Emote

Target: Anyone within line of sight, up to MAG targets.

Upkeep: 6 Emote/tick

Lock up to 20 Anger from each of your target's pools and give them a 'Targeted By Channel' card. For every ten points locked, increase your target's STR, or decrease their AGL or EMP, by 1. Locked anger cannot be drawn, and cannot be used in any other ability. Your target may remove this card from them by bidding DISC vs your MAG (compare your bid value to the values on each of their cards and remove individually).

level 2.name: Manifest Anger (Area)
level 2.description:
Cost to activate: N*15 Anger

Cover N squares with manifested anger crystals. The squares must be continious and start adjacent to you. For each affected square a creature is occupying, it takes 2d8 damage.

Any creature in one of the affected squares or adjacent to one of the affected squares takes 1d4 damage from radiant heat (and anything easily flammable nearbye will likely catch on fire) during the AP phase. Until you use a movement card, leave this card face up (although not necessarily in one of your active slots). If this card is face up, you may spend 1 AP to move the emote spent, along with this card, to your pool. Whenever a creature takes damage from occupying an affected square, you may discard this card to give 1/2 of the Anger originally put into this card spread evenly, to all affected creatures.

level 2.name: Festering Rage+
level 2.description: Whenever you would gain Anger, gain +1 Anger. Stacks with Festering Rage

level 2.name: Multi-Channel Anger+
level 2.description:
Cost to activate: 15 Emote

Target: Anyone within line of sight, up to MAG targets.

Upkeep: 9 Emote/tick

Lock up to 28 Anger from each of your target's pools and give them a 'Targeted By Channel' card. For every seven points locked, increase your target's STR, or decrease their AGL or EMP, by 1. Locked anger cannot be drawn, and cannot be used in any other ability. Your target may remove this card from them by bidding DISC vs your MAG (compare your bid value to the values on each of their cards and remove individually).

level 3.name: Manifest Defensiveness
level 3.description:
Cost to activate: N * 5 Anger

Create a small patch of anger crystals on your skin, right where a blow is about to strike you. Decrease the damage from a non-area attack targeting you by N * 5. Take 1d6 - 4 damage. (The manifested anger burns you if you're too slow to remove it and is sometimes in uncomfortable places)

level 3.name: Unstoppable Rage
level 3.description:
Cost to activate: 25 Anger

Upkeep: 7 Anger/tick

Until you are at -4*Max HP, take no negative effects from damage or lack of fatigue.
